Text: Scamp... the license files as in xp goes to Document and settings -> All users -> Application Data -> then you will find the IncrediMail folder. Remember to set folder options to "view hidden files and folders" by clicking on "Tools" in Windows explorer menu bar, then choose "Folder Options" then click "View" and finally choose "view hidden files and folders" this will display all hidden files and folder for easy access.
